formElement.label: OpenShift Template Content (YAML File)
formElement.documentation: Content of an OpenShift template (YAML file) containing related services and deployments definitions.

formElement.label: Template Parameter Values:
formElement.documentation: Template parameter values to use. Format "paramName1=value1, paramName2=value2"

formElement.label: Project Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the CloudBees Flow project in which the application or microservices will be created.

formElement.label: Create Microservices within an Application:
formElement.documentation: (Optional) Select to create all services defined in the template file within one application in CloudBees Flow. If selected, then the application name must be provided. If not selected, microservices will be created at the top-level in the project.

formElement.label: Application Name:
formElement.documentation: (Optional) The name of the new application that will contain the microservices. Required only if 'Create Microservices within an Application' is selected.

formElement.label: Environment Project Name:
formElement.documentation: (Optional) The project containing the Environment where the services will be deployed.

formElement.label: Environment Name:
formElement.documentation: (Optional) The name of an existing environment that contains a cluster where the newly created microservice(s) will be deployed.

formElement.label: Cluster Name:
formElement.documentation: (Optional) The name of the existing CloudBees Flow cluster representing a OpenShift cluster in the environment above where the newly created microservice(s) will be deployed.
